1.0.name: wordpress/shortcode-plugin-download-counter
1.0.description:
With this plugin, developers can include a plugin download counter on Wordpress posts or pages. This plugin grabs the number of total downloads for a given plugin from wordpress.org.

Features:

  • This plugin returns the total number of downloads for a specific plugin which you host on wordpress.org
  • Easy implementation on posts or pages by using shortcodes

e.g.:

[PluginDownloadCounter pluginname="google-maps-v3-shortcode-multiple-markers"]
